actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: Joint resolution to direct the Secretary of Transportation to make an investigation and study of the condition and adequacy of farm-to-market roads, railroad beds, and availability of operational rail lines serving rural areas in the United States.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to make an investigation and study of the condition and adequacy of farm to market roads, railroad beds, and availability of operational rail lines serving rural areas in the United States.

titles.title: Joint resolution to direct the Secretary of Transportation to make an investigation and study of the condition and adequacy of farm-to-market roads, railroad beds, and availability of operational rail lines serving rural areas in the United States.
